nodes.text: The ISB Central Office was the headquarters of the Imperial Security Bureau. It was a massive office complex located on Coruscant. It was here that Gray Paladin Laranth Tarak and Padawan Kajin Savaros were taken after their capture. A battle was fought here when Whiplash affiliates Jax Pavan, Haninum Tyk Rhinann, and I-5YQ attempted to rescue their friends.
